results.content:
Of all the Udemy courses that I have completed, I found this course to be the most awful.

The course is not even a basic course of PHP.

The instructor has created some very basic single page PHP projects, which he tries to explain and fails miserably.

Most of the time the instructor explains what is a variable, what is the use of semi-colon etc while leaving the explanation of the basic tags of PHP.

One thing more, the instructor pastes blocks of PHP code, a practice which students hate the most on Udemy, in between HTML code and then tries to explain.

The course is not recommended to students who have even the basic understanding of coding.

One funny thing, while the instructor speaks, sometimes there is a sound of a donkey in the background.
